COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee
v.
Lenwood MASON, Appellant No. 759 CAP Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. Submitted: June 13, 2018
October 17, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW, this 17 th day of October, 2018, the Order of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County is AFFIRMED .
